description.lang: The Building 36 Intelligent Thermostat gives you remote access and control of your thermostat.Enjoy effortless energy management, climate and ambiance control, custom automation and measurable results. Create custom smart schedules that automate your thermostat. Receive critical temperature alerts to know instantly when your thermostat reaches preset limits. Save energy by using location-based automation to have your thermostat adjust itself while you're out.This thermostat is part of an entire ecosystem of home automation products.It was built to provide a single integrated solution to give you more from your connected home.
